name: Shootris (GB)
description:
No, I couldn't think of a better name :)

A small Gameboy game, made in 1 week for GBJAM 8. Clear blocks before they reach the top of the screen, and don't get crushed! Falling blocks can be destroyed with rockets, landed blocks can only be destroyed with dynamite. Clear all blocks for extra points and to advance to the next level.

Created with GBDK2020. Embed powered by binjgb.

ControlsActionSpaceJump
XShootZDynamiteArrow KeysMovementEnterPause / Show points

For the best experience, the ROM file can also be downloaded below for playing on your own emulator (or Gameboy!). This will also keep your highscores persistent! 

For more Gameboy check out my other games.

Have fun!

September 2020
